Title: Requires school bus drivers and attendants who ride with children attending preschool special education programs to complete training
Summary: Requires school bus drivers and attendants who ride with children attending preschool special education programs to complete training in the needs of such children.
LawCode: Amd ยง1229-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring school bus drivers and school bus attendants who ride with children attending preschool special education programs to complete training in the needs of such children
